p: Rectal temperatures were taken during physical examinations and M00 radio telemetry devices (DSI, Saint Paul, MN USA) were used to monitor temperatures in real-time throughout the study [ 79]. To generate a single data point every 30 seconds, temperature data points were averaged and then statistically filtered to remove noise and signal artifacts (Notocord-hem Evolution software platform, Version 4.3.0.47, Notocord Inc., Newark, NJ, USA).
